Items.Title: A Local Law to establish a temporary advisory committee to advise the mayor and the speaker of the council on issues pertaining to access to broadband technologies within the city of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Create a temporary task force to study how affordable broadband access can be made available.

Items.Title: A Local Law to establish a temporary advisory committee to advise the mayor and the speaker of the council on issues pertaining to access to broadband technologies within the city of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Create a temporary task force to study how affordable broadband access can be made available.

Items.Title: A Local Law to establish a temporary advisory committee to advise the mayor and the speaker of the council on issues pertaining to access to broadband technologies within the city of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Create a temporary task force to study how affordable broadband access can be made available.

Items.Title: A Local Law to establish a temporary advisory committee to advise the mayor and the speaker of the council on issues pertaining to access to broadband technologies within the city of New York.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Create a temporary task force to study how affordable broadband access can be made available.
